summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in Supplemental Plat of Glen Park Addition, being the alley from 18th Avenue North to 19th Avenue North, between East John Street and East Thomas Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 110788 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
